title: Two bedroom apartment in small brick brownstone
map_address: Park Vale Avenue near Glenville Avenue
posting_body: Two-bedroom apartment in a small brick building on a quiet one-way street near Harvard Avenue.
Hardwood floors, updated kitchen, ceiling fan on the third floor.
One two-bedroom $2500 for 9/1, spacious larger two bedroom $2600.
One block walk to either T (green line) or 57 bus to Boston.
An app-operated laundry in the basement of the building.
Easy resident and visitor parking on the street.
The rental fee is one month.
Property can be viewed this weekend.
Email, call, or text with any questions.
